Crispy Outside, Tender Inside: Opponents hit by Guoba's attacks have their Pyro RES reduced by 15% for 6s.
Oil Meets Fire: The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the opponent for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.
Deepfry: Increases the Level of Pyronado by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
Guoba Mad: Increases the Level of Guoba Attack by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
Condensed Pyronado: For the duration of Pyronado, all party members receive a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus.
